comment: /**  * Check to see if the PersistentTask's cluster state contains the data frame transform(s) we  * are interested in  */
code: /**  * Check to see if the PersistentTask's cluster state contains the data frame transform(s) we  * are interested in  */ public static boolean stateHasDataFrameTransforms(String id, ClusterState state) {     boolean hasTransforms = false.     PersistentTasksCustomMetaData pTasksMeta = state.getMetaData().custom(PersistentTasksCustomMetaData.TYPE).     if (pTasksMeta != null) {         // persistent tasks and see if at least one is a data frame task         if (id.equals(MetaData.ALL)) {             hasTransforms = pTasksMeta.tasks().stream().anyMatch(persistentTask -> persistentTask.getTaskName().equals(DataFrameField.TASK_NAME)).         } else if (pTasksMeta.getTask(id) != null) {             // If we're looking for a single transform, we can just check directly             hasTransforms = true.         }     }     return hasTransforms. }
